title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Play MSFS using Xbox Cloud gaming
description:
In this video we will look at how to play MSFS using on the Xbox Cloud. First we will go through the steps which are required to connect the Xbox Wireless controller to the tablet (in this case an iPad). Once that is setup we will start MSFS and will first look around what is available by default and what you might want to install. After that we will perform a short flight to check the performance.
